messages:
Name: Wilfred Ndidi
Nationality: Nigeria
Date of Birth: December 16, 1996
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Leicester City
Premier League clubs played for: Leicester City

Wilfred Ndidi is a Leicester City midfielder who has played in the majority of the team's Premier League matches in 2024/2025, making 28 appearances overall and playing 2,337 minutes. He has been selected in the starting XI in all 28 of these appearances across their 38 fixtures.

Ndidi last appeared in a league match on May 18 for Leicester City versus Ipswich Town. In that encounter the 28-year-old picked up an assist for his side in the team's 2-0 victory. This season he has recorded five Premier League assists - the most for his side. He has been booked eight times.
Ndidi played 32 Championship games last season for Leicester City, scored four goals and provided five assists.
Ndidi switched to Leicester City in January 2017 from Genk, for whom he made 63 league appearances in total, scoring four goals and providing one assist.

It was on January 14, 2017 that Ndidi made his league debut, at the age of 20 years and 29 days, versus Chelsea. Overall, in his Premier League career, he has appeared 220 times in the competition, with seven goals scored and 14 assists.
